mapper.insert: insert into `message`( CONTENT, RECEIVER, SENDER) VALUES (#{CONTENT},#{RECEIVER} ,#{SENDER});
mapper.select: select m.*, DATE_FORMAT(m.SENDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as SENDDATE2 from `message` m where m.sender = #{value}
select m.*, DATE_FORMAT(m.SENDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as SENDDATE2 from `message` m where m.receiver = #{value}
mapper.update: update message set checking = 1 where receiver = #{value} and checking = 0
mapper.select: select * from message where receiver = #{value} and checking = 0
SELECT * FROM message WHERE SENDER = #{SENDER} and RECEIVER= #{RECEIVER} and DATE_FORMAT(senddate,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY senddate desc limit 1
